Posted By: leon
I have a couple handfuls to sell....what kind of condition are you looking for?  regards

Posted By: Andrew
Hi Leon, any condition is fine.  I'm more concerned about price, then obtaining a key card (except for the Beecher.)  I do plan to holder them for display purposes, so no extreme diamond cuts or trimmed cards.  In regard to the Zeenut, I'm considering one card from each year 1911-1938 of a Portland player.

“A smooth sea never made a skilled mariner.” - English Proverb
